thread.title: Cleveland program trains steelworkers of tomorrow PBS NewsHour
thread.title_full: Video: Cleveland program trains steelworkers of tomorrow | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: Cleveland program trains steelworkers of tomorrow PBS NewsHour
text: In Cleveland, a special school-to-work program leads community college students to jobs at a local steel plant where hundreds of workers are expected to start retiring. Special correspondent Amy Hansen from WVIZ/PBS Idea Stream reports in a preview of American Graduate Day on PBS.
